entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:43 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edson Airport 9:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Wind Chill: -8
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches becoming fog this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 8:38 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Fog dissipating. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog becoming fog patches late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 8:38 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:38 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 2. Forecast issued 8:38 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
